100.description: Default size, used for most components, i.e. checkboxes, tooltips, buttons

200.description: Large size, used for big surfaces and components, i.e. modals, cards, alerts

300.description: Large size, used for big surfaces and components, i.e. modals, cards, alerts

400.description: Large size, used for big surfaces and components, i.e. modals, cards, alerts

500.description: Large size, used for big surfaces and components, i.e. modals, cards, alerts

max.description: Large size, used for unique components, i.e. pills, avatars

100.description: Small shadow used for small components like checkboxes, buttons

200.description: Medium sized shadow for components like dropdowns, tooltips, toast notifications

300.description: Large shadow for components like modals, drawers

fullWidth.description: For full width / maximum available space

neutral.description: Used for primary text and icon color

neutralFaded.description: Used for secondary text and icon color

accent.description: Used for accent text and icon color

accentHover.description: Interactive hover state for accent foreground elements

accentActive.description: Interactive active state for accent foreground elements

positive.description: Used for positive text and icon color

warning.description: Used for warning text and icon color

danger.description: Used for danger text and icon color

dangerHover.description: Interactive hover state for danger foreground elements

dangerActive.description: Interactive active state for danger foreground elements

disabled.description: Used for disabled text and icon color

ghost.description: Used for placeholder text and icon color

onInteractive.description: Used for foreground elements placed on top of any interactive high emphasis semantic background such as background "positive" "warning" and "danger”

onPrimary.description: Used for foreground elements placed on top of "primary" background elements

info.description: Used for information text and icon color

neutral.description: Used for backgrounds where you want to differentiate emphasis

neutralHover.description: Interactive hover state for neutral background

neutralActive.description: Interactive active state for neutral background

neutralFaded.description: Used for backgrounds where you want to differentiate emphasis with low intensity

neutralFadedHover.description: Interactive hover state for neutral faded background

neutralFadedActive.description: Interactive active state for neutral faded background

positive.description: Used for positive backgrounds with high emphasis

positiveFaded.description: Used for positive backgrounds with low emphasis

danger.description: Used for danger backgrounds with high emphasis

dangerHover.description: Interactive hover state for danger high emphasis

dangerActive.description: Interactive active state for danger high emphasis

dangerFaded.description: Used for positive backgrounds with low emphasis

dangerFadedHover.description: Interactive hover state for danger low emphasis

dangerFadedActive.description: Interactive active state for danger low emphasis

page.description: Used for the global application background

pageFaded.description: Used for the global application background as a secondary color

base.description: Used for background of elements displayed directly on the page surface

elevated.description: Used for background of elements displayed on top of other elements

primary.description: Used for backgrounds where you want very high emphasis

warning.description: Used for warning backgrounds with high emphasis

warningFaded.description: Used for warning backgrounds with low emphasis

accent.description: Used for accent backgrounds with high emphasis

accentHover.description: Interactive hover state for accent high emphasis

accentActive.description: Interactive active state for accent high emphasis

accentFaded.description: Used for accent backgrounds with low emphasis

accentFadedHover.description: Interactive hover state for accent low emphasis

accentFadedActive.description: Interactive active state for accent low emphasis

info.description: Used for information backgrounds with high emphasis

infoFaded.description: Used for information backgrounds with low emphasis

overlay.description: Used for the backdrop of modals or drawers

neutral.description: Used for borders where you want to differentiate emphasis

neutralHover.description: Interactive hover state for neutral border

neutralActive.description: Interactive active state for neutral border

neutralFaded.description: Used for borders where you want to differentiate emphasis with low intensity

neutralFadedHover.description: Interactive hover state for neutral faded border

neutralFadedActive.description: Interactive active state for neutral faded border

positiveFaded.description: Used for positive borders with low emphasis

danger.description: Used for danger borders with high emphasis

dangerFaded.description: Used for danger borders with low emphasis

accentFaded.description: Used for accent borders with low emphasis

info.description: Used for information borders with high emphasis

infoFaded.description: Used for information borders with low emphasis

primary.description: Default text color. Used as the main text color for the emails. Provides good and legible contrast for our content.

secondary.description: @hardCoded - Secondary text color. Used for less important text.

footer.description: [Should be merged with secondary text color] Used for the text color in the footer.

link.description: Default link text color. Used for all paragraph level links in emails.

stroke.description: Border color of the container box

default.description: @hardCoded - Color for horizontal lines to split content
